I bring to

is it that I articulate very well is it

you know the public policy will become

that i' had been working on
exploitation exploitation by landlords
by money lenders by

exploiter because there was no line in M

because of the Brilliance of the people

unjust Act of taking Knowledge from the

rent from that knowledge by sharing it
and doing consult writing papers and
Publishing them in the papers getting

then a dilemma arose in the mind that if

couldn't live with it any longer so I

maybe I saw a honeybee or it occurred to

flower cross
pollinates and when it takes the nectar

in fact they invite the honey bees
through their
colors and they don't keep the bees
don't keep all the honey for

whenever we learn something from people
it must be shared with them in the
language they must not remain

works on the

if you have clothes and you don't have
